name: Claudia

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A strong sub DPS unit with a short cooldown skill that provides damage buffs with most of her advancements.

skills.name: Quick Slash
skills.description:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.

  • First Attack: Deal damage equal to 46.8% of ATK + 2 and knock the target back a short distance.
  • Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 65.6% of ATK + 3 and knock the target back a short distance.
  • Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 59.3% of ATK + 3 and knock the target back a short distance.
  • Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 104.1% of ATK + 5 and knock the target back a short distance.
  • Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 177.8% of ATK + 9 and launch the target.

skills.name: Jumping Strike
skills.description:
While airborne, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.

  • First Attack: Deal damage equal to 27.9% of ATK + 1.
  • Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 48.4% of ATK + 3.
  • Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 114.6% of ATK + 6.
  • Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 139% of ATK + 7 and deliver a knockdown.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description:
Hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.

Upon hit, suspend the target and deal 47.8% of ATK + 3 to a single target.

skills.name: Diving Edge
skills.description:
Tap and hold the normal attack while airborne, or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.

While falling, deal damage equal to 10% of ATK + 1 each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 76.4% of ATK + 4 and knock the target back.

The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then tap normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK + 30.

skills.name: Leap Attack
skills.description:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.

The Wanderer swings their blade and deals damage equal to 37.9% of ATK + 2 to the target, strongly suspending them and becoming airborne, then dealing additional damage equal to 56.8% of ATK + 3.

skills.name: Roam
skills.description:
Dance through targets while swinging the blade, dealing damage equal to 418% of ATK + 22 in total to up to 5 targets (attack on the same target deal 20% less damage).

At the end of the Skill, slash the space in front, dealing damage equal to 264% of ATK + 14 to targets, and suspend them.

Immune to crowd-control effects while ability is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.

Cooldown: 15 seconds.

skills.name: Unbridled Flurry
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder, who then rushes to and strongly suspends a target, dealing 523.3% of ATK + 28 damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals 209.6% of ATK + 11 damage to the target, while gaining immunity to grievous, freeze, burn, and electrify effects for 5 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Grievous
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will inflict damage equal to 137% of ATK with the next attack, and make the target grievous for 7 seconds, taking 20% extra damage.

weapon_resonance.name: Physical Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Increase physical ATK by 15% and physical resistance by 25%. Active by equipping 2 or more physical-damage weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect cannot be stacked.

advancement:
After hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, grant 1 stack of the following buff:

Increase damage dealt by 8% for 25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.

When hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, apply 1 stack of War Wounds to the target:

Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by 10% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 1 time.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants Skill Damage Boost, which increases all weapon skill damage by 20% for 25 seconds. Effect cannot be stacked.

Skills hitting the same target no longer reduces the damage dealt. After using Guren Blade's skills or a discharge skill, all targets with War Wounds within 8 meters gain another 1 stack of War Wounds.

traits.name: Blink
traits.description: Go invisible for 1 seconds upon dodging.

traits.name: Shadow
traits.description: Go invisible for 1.5 seconds upon dodging.
